last_episode_to_air.name: Code Extended to Algeria
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hijinks and revelations abound as André hops a train in Algeria in search of the mysterious Yannick -- with the other agents in hot pursuit.

name: A Very Secret Service
overview: At the height of the Cold War in 1960, André Merlaux joins the French Secret Service and contends with enemies both foreign and bureaucratic.

episodes.name: The Tsét
episodes.overview: Paris, 1960. André Merlaux is hired as a trainee at the French secret service under the seasoned eye of several elite agents and a formidable colonel.

episodes.name: There's German and German
episodes.overview: Moulinier and Jacquard cause a diplomatic incident while trying to capture a high-value target. Merlaux meets the enchanting Sophie.

episodes.name: A Bit of Sun
episodes.overview: When an African state demands independence, Merlaux gets his first big assignment and discovers a passion for politics.

episodes.name: Algeria, It's France
episodes.overview: Joining Jacquard in Algeria for some real-world training, Merlaux faces the darker side of a spy's life for the first time.

episodes.name: The Plum Tree
episodes.overview: On a mission to Moscow with Merlaux, Calot stirs up trouble with the CIA. Marie-Jo's upcoming promotion creates a mini-crisis at the office.

episodes.name: A Modern Woman
episodes.overview: While the senior agents compete for the role of assistant director, Merlaux tries to figure out what Sophie means by the term 'modern woman.'

episodes.name: VG 42
episodes.overview: Moulinier, Jacquard and Calot go on strike to protest the loss of a bonus. Barred from seeing Sophie, Merlaux dives into his work and uncovers a plot.

episodes.name: Mission Monôme
episodes.overview: After discovering that Merlaux is still seeing Sophie, the Colonel sets a trap for him under the guise of a high-stakes solo mission.

episodes.name: Invisible Plume
episodes.overview: Sent to Algiers to intercept a terrorist, Moulinier and the others go to extremes to wrap up the mission and make it to a rugby match.

episodes.name: Code Name Mole
episodes.overview: Determined to flush out the mole in the secret service, Moïse borrows a lie detector from Mossad, which immediately puts the Colonel on edge.

episodes.name: The Five-Year Plan
episodes.overview: The hunt for the mole awakens Calot's paranoia, the Colonel discovers just how much Moïse knows about his past, and Merlaux opens up to Sophie.

episodes.name: In the Service of my France
episodes.overview: Determined to get rid of Merlaux, the Colonel sends him to Algiers to stake out the mole, all the while plotting a devious surprise.

episodes.name: Tetanus and Yellow Fever
episodes.overview: Calot, Moulinier and Jacquard fly to Cuba to rescue a missing agent, only to find she doesn't want their help. The Colonel lays a trap for Moïse.

episodes.name: Self-Driven
episodes.overview: As France votes on Algeria's future, Jacquard hatches a crooked scheme, André works to free Moïse, and Sophie springs a surprise on her family.

episodes.name: When the Water’s at 12°, Expect It to Be Cold
episodes.overview: The Colonel orders his henchmen to take out André, Marie-Jo uses her baking to gather intel, and a delegation from Quebec asks the agency for help.

episodes.name: The Monkey Is in the Rocket
episodes.overview: A shocking announcement leaves André confused. After laughing off Calot's warnings about the Cold War, Moulinier ignites a major international crisis.

episodes.name: The Coup
episodes.overview: During a mission to Algeria, the Colonel's strange behavior prompts Jacquard to take a drastic step. André makes contact with a mysterious figure.

episodes.name: The Green Gerbil Isn’t So Green
episodes.overview: While Jacquard and Moktar transport the bomb -- and the unraveling Colonel -- across the desert, Moulinier falls head over heels for his target.

episodes.name: What’s Africa Got to Do With It?
episodes.overview: Tasked with choosing a new president for an African nation, Moulinier follows his heart. Meanwhile, André faces yet more grueling tests.

episodes.name: John, Jacky, Yvonne and the General
episodes.overview: Ahead of a visit from the Kennedys, two CIA agents try to stamp out any hint of communism at the agency. The Colonel sics a surveillance team on Irène.

episodes.name: Tovaritch Merlaux
episodes.overview: While Calot schools his colleagues in the curious ways of the Eastern bloc, André tours the nerve center of the KGB.

episodes.name: Poland Is a Lovely Place
episodes.overview: The Colonel threatens to reveal Moïse's secret if he doesn't deliver André within 36 hours. The shoe incident leads to historic repercussions.

episodes.name: The Non-Death of the Dead Mole
episodes.overview: While the real mole attempts to eliminate André, Moïse gains some leverage of his own, and the Colonel seeks a solution to his wedding problem.

episodes.name: Code Extended to Algeria
episodes.overview: Hijinks and revelations abound as André hops a train in Algeria in search of the mysterious Yannick -- with the other agents in hot pursuit.
